structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Time for Correction Upon Finding of Guilt.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.6. Time for Correction Upon Finding of Guilt.
If the owner, or other responsible party, is found guilty by the Hearing Officer, the Hearing Officer shall set a compliance date that shall not exceed 14 days beyond the date of the finding of guilt.
